Other.Description: - Outer ziplines hero speed increased by 20% relative to inner lanes (same as troopers on outer lanes zipline being faster)

Heroes.Description: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Wraith}} Wraith Cards, {{HeroIcon|Shiv}} Shiv Rage and lifesteal from increasing by shooting the shop

Abilities.Description: - Urn now drops when teleporting with {{AbilityIcon|Mirage}} Mirage's {{AbilityIcon|Traveler}} Traveler
